entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Attawapiskat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:07 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -27.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Attawapiskat Airport 10:24 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -27.5°C
Pressure: 101.6 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -35
Dewpoint: -30.2°C
Wind: WNW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
